---
name: Bug Issue
about: Create a ticket for a bug
title: ''
labels: 'bug'
---

## Bug Description

Describe the bug, including the expected behavior and the current issue.

- e.g., A server request error occurs when clicking the "Submit" button, and the result popup does not appear.

## To reproduce

Provide steps to reproduce the bug.

- e.g.
  1. Go to <https://example.com>
  2. Log in to the account
  3. Go to <https://example.com/form>
  4. Fill out the form
  5. Click the "Submit" button

## Expected Behavior

A clear and concise description of the expected behavior.

- e.g., When clicking the "Submit" button, a server request is made, and the corresponding result popup is displayed.

## Screenshots

Add screenshots that help explain the bug.

### Environment

- Device: [e.g. iPhone6]
- OS: [e.g. iOS]
- Browser [e.g. chrome, safari]
- Version [e.g. 22]

### Additional context

Provide any additional context here.
